Package org.neo4j.index.internal.gbptree

Class PointerChecking

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.index.internal.gbptree.PointerChecking
  • class PointerChecking
extends Object
    Methods for ensuring a read GSP pointer is valid.

      Assert cursor rest on a node that does not have a valid (not crashed) successor.
      (package private) static void checkPointer​(long result, boolean allowNoNode)

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • checkPointer

        static void checkPointer​(long result,
                         boolean allowNoNode)
        Checks a read pointer for success/failure and throws appropriate exception with failure information if failure. Must be called after a consistent read from page cache (after PageCursor.shouldRetry().
        Parameters:
        result - result from GenerationSafePointerPair.FLAG_READ or GenerationSafePointerPair.write(PageCursor, long, long, long).
        allowNoNode - If TreeNode.NO_NODE_FLAG is allowed as pointer value.

      • assertNoSuccessor

        static boolean assertNoSuccessor​(PageCursor cursor,
                                 long stableGeneration,
                                 long unstableGeneration)
        Assert cursor rest on a node that does not have a valid (not crashed) successor.
        Parameters:
        cursor - PageCursor resting on a tree node.
        stableGeneration - Current stable generation of tree.
        unstableGeneration - Current unstable generation of tree.
